channel.title: Early access limitations
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I understand this game is still in early access.. However if I pay for it now to start playing, will I receive updates and more importantly the full release when it comes out?
Or would I need to re-purchase when the full release is done?
Cheers ! :slight_smile:

item.title: Early access limitations
item.dc:creator: ted135
item.description:
Really appreciate the answers guys - can’t wait to re-play my all time favorite.

Read full topic

item.title: Early access limitations
item.dc:creator: Cryoshell
item.description:
You will take updates for free

Read full topic

item.title: Early access limitations
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
You don’t need to repurchase. The game is yours if you buy early access, including all of our future free updates (like STU and Xen).

Read full topic

item.title: Early access limitations
item.dc:creator: KevinJRattman
item.description:
Once you purchase it, all upcoming patches, including Surface Tension: Uncut and Xen Update, will be free.

Read full topic
